fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizers.interfaces.syncTools.semaphore

Interface SemaphoreI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SemaphoreInboundPort

    public interface SemaphoreI
extends OfferedI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acquire()
      Acquires a permit from this semaphore, blocking until one is available, or the thread is interrupted.
      void acquire(int permits)
      Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, blocking until all are available, or the thread is interrupted.
      int availablePermits()
      Returns the current number of permits available in this semaphore.
      int getQueueLength()
      Returns an estimate of the number of threads waiting to acquire.
      void release()
      Releases a permit, returning it to the semaphore.
      void release(int permits)
      Releases the given number of permits, returning them to the semaphore.
      boolean tryAcquire()
      Acquires a permit from this semaphore, only if one is available at the time of invocation.
      boolean tryAcquire(int permits, long timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, if all become available within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
